login.form.info:
Zum Einlogen in neXus PRIME bitten geben Sie Benutzername und Passwort ein.
Danach klicken Sie die 'Einlogen' Button.
login.info:
Willkommen in User Self-Service Portal von neXus PRIME!
In dieses User Self-Service Portal, you can manage your credentials like smart cards, smart tokens and certificates.
To log in with your smart card, plug the card in the card reader and click on 'Smartcard login & other'.
You can also select an alternative login method, while some functions may not be available then.
